name: Stay Awake (Salt_Mate)
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "Sequel".

Description

Why would you wanna sleep, if you could just stay awake? Run away from the Sandman and try to stay awake as long as you can!

Credits

  • Art: DitzieDoodle
  • Code: Salt_Mate - Code & Game Design
  • Based on: https://denschstar.itch.io/schlaf-schaf 
  • Music: https://freesound.org/people/envirOmaniac2/sounds/398941/
  • Game Over: https://freesound.org/people/Baltiyar13/sounds/527584/
  • Soundeffect: https://freesound.org/people/Jofae/sounds/362328/ /  https://freesound.org/people/Baltiyar13/sounds/527584/
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/de/no-virus.font?l[]=10&l[]=1
